description: Gets a list of the PII entity detection jobs that you have submitted.

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: Filters the jobs that are returned. You can filter jobs on their name, status, or the date and time that they were submitted. You can only set one filter at a time. JobName (string) --- Filters on the name of the job. JobStatus (string) --- Filters the list of jobs based on job status. Returns only jobs with the specified status. SubmitTimeBefore (datetime) --- Filters the list of jobs based on the time that the job was submitted for processing. Returns only jobs submitted before the specified time. Jobs are returned in ascending order, oldest to newest. SubmitTimeAfter (datetime) --- Filters the list of jobs based on the time that the job was submitted for processing. Returns only jobs submitted after the specified time. Jobs are returned in descending order, newest to oldest.

nested_params.name: JobName
nested_params.description: Filters on the name of the job.

nested_params.name: JobStatus
nested_params.description: Filters the list of jobs based on job status. Returns only jobs with the specified status.

nested_params.name: SubmitTimeBefore
nested_params.description: Filters the list of jobs based on the time that the job was submitted for processing. Returns only jobs submitted before the specified time. Jobs are returned in ascending order, oldest to newest.

nested_params.name: SubmitTimeAfter
nested_params.description: Filters the list of jobs based on the time that the job was submitted for processing. Returns only jobs submitted after the specified time. Jobs are returned in descending order, newest to oldest.

nested_items.name: PiiEntitiesDetectionJobPropertiesList
nested_items.description: A list containing the properties of each job that is returned.

nested_items.name: JobId
nested_items.description: The identifier assigned to the PII entities detection job.

nested_items.name: JobArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the PII entities detection job. It is a unique, fully qualified identifier for the job. It includes the Amazon Web Services account, Amazon Web Services Region, and the job ID. The format of the ARN is as follows:

nested_items.name: JobName
nested_items.description: The name that you assigned the PII entities detection job.

nested_items.name: JobStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the PII entities detection job. If the status is FAILED, the Message field shows the reason for the failure.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A description of the status of a job.

nested_items.name: SubmitTime
nested_items.description: The time that the PII entities detection job was submitted for processing.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The time that the PII entities detection job completed.

nested_items.name: InputDataConfig
nested_items.description: The input properties for a PII entities detection job.

nested_items.name: S3Uri
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 URI for the input data. The URI must be in same Region as the API endpoint that you are calling. The URI can point to a single input file or it can provide the prefix for a collection of data files.

nested_items.name: InputFormat
nested_items.description: Specifies how the text in an input file should be processed:
ONE_DOC_PER_FILE - Each file is considered a separate document. Use this option when you are processing large documents, such as newspaper articles or scientific papers.
ONE_DOC_PER_LINE - Each line in a file is considered a separate document. Use this option when you are processing many short documents, such as text messages.

nested_items.name: DocumentReaderConfig
nested_items.description: Provides configuration parameters to override the default actions for extracting text from PDF documents and image files.

nested_items.name: DocumentReadAction
nested_items.description: This field defines the Amazon Textract API operation that Amazon Comprehend uses to extract text from PDF files and image files. Enter one of the following values:
TEXTRACT_DETECT_DOCUMENT_TEXT - The Amazon Comprehend service uses the DetectDocumentText API operation.
TEXTRACT_ANALYZE_DOCUMENT - The Amazon Comprehend service uses the AnalyzeDocument API operation.

nested_items.name: DocumentReadMode
nested_items.description: Determines the text extraction actions for PDF files. Enter one of the following values:
SERVICE_DEFAULT - use the Amazon Comprehend service defaults for PDF files.
FORCE_DOCUMENT_READ_ACTION - Amazon Comprehend uses the Textract API specified by DocumentReadAction for all PDF files, including digital PDF files.

nested_items.name: FeatureTypes
nested_items.description: Specifies the type of Amazon Textract features to apply. If you chose TEXTRACT_ANALYZE_DOCUMENT as the read action, you must specify one or both of the following values:
TABLES - Returns additional information about any tables that are detected in the input document.
FORMS - Returns additional information about any forms that are detected in the input document.

nested_items.name: OutputDataConfig
nested_items.description: The output data configuration that you supplied when you created the PII entities detection job.

nested_items.name: S3Uri
nested_items.description: When you use the PiiOutputDataConfig object with asynchronous operations, you specify the Amazon S3 location where you want to write the output data.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: ID for the Amazon Web Services Key Management Service (KMS) key that Amazon Comprehend uses to encrypt the output results from an analysis job.

nested_items.name: RedactionConfig
nested_items.description: Provides configuration parameters for PII entity redaction.

nested_items.name: PiiEntityTypes
nested_items.description: An array of the types of PII entities that Amazon Comprehend detects in the input text for your request.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: MaskMode
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the PII entity is redacted with the mask character or the entity type.

nested_items.name: MaskCharacter
nested_items.description: A character that replaces each character in the redacted PII entity.

nested_items.name: LanguageCode
nested_items.description: The language code of the input documents.

nested_items.name: DataAccessRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role that grants Amazon Comprehend read access to your input data.

nested_items.name: Mode
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the output provides the locations (offsets) of PII entities or a file in which PII entities are redacted.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Identifies the next page of results to return.
